title: SQL Formatter
subtitle: Format your SQL queries elegantly. Support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle and SQL Server.
emptyPlaceholder: Insert a SQL query in the "Original SQL" tab
toastGeneric: Formatted as generic SQL. Some specific syntax may not be recognized.
seoTitle: Free Online SQL Formatter - Beautify Your SQL Code
seoDescription: The best free online SQL formatter and beautifier. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle (PL/SQL), and SQL Server (T-SQL). Make your SQL queries elegant and readable instantly.
whyFormatDescription: Clean, well-formatted SQL code is essential for maintainability and collaboration. Our tool helps you transform messy queries into readable scripts, making it easier to debug and optimize your database operations.
feature1Desc: Support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and BigQuery.
feature2Desc: Transform keywords, functions, and identifiers to uppercase, lowercase, or preserve original casing.
feature3Desc: Automatically compact lists in parentheses for cleaner WHERE IN clauses.
feature4Desc: Adjust tab width, expression width, and logical operator placement to match your team's style guide.
howToUseStep1: 1. Paste your SQL query into the 'Original SQL' tab.
howToUseStep2: 2. Select your database dialect (e.g., PostgreSQL or MySQL).
howToUseStep3: 3. Customize the formatting options to your preference.
howToUseStep4: 4. Copy the beautified SQL from the 'Formatted SQL' tab.
postgresqlDesc: Standard compliant and robust open-source database dialect.
mysqlDesc: World's most popular open-source database syntax.
oracleDesc: Powerful PL/SQL formatting for enterprise applications.
sqlServerDesc: Comprehensive T-SQL support for Microsoft SQL Server.
bigqueryDesc: Modern Google Cloud BigQuery SQL syntax support.
